Instruction: Wash and pit the plums, then slice them thinly.
In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
In a large mixing bowl, toss the mixed greens with the dressing until evenly coated.
Divide the dressed greens among serving plates.
Top the greens with sliced plums, crumbled goat cheese, and chopped walnuts.
Serve the plum and goat cheese salad immediately as a refreshing side dish.
